title: Lovely Deceit
description: Growing up in the elite world, I’ve been taught not to trust. Still, I did it anyway.Silly, silly me. I should’ve known how it would end…Blindsided by their broken parts and their similarities to my own story, I let my guard down. I put my faith in them—my gorgeous Economics professor and the Knights’ bad apple.And was rewarded with the ultimate betrayal.Not again. Never again.It’s time for my revenge.It won’t be pretty. It won’t be sweet. But it will be one-hundred percent satisfying.I can promise them that.
author: E.M. Moore
